sentences.sContent: These are usually episodic in nature and for the most part are a reflection of the immature central nervous system.
sentences.sContent_eng: These are usually episodic in nature and for the most part are a reflection of the immature central nervous system.
sentences.sCn: 这些通常在本质中表现为插曲式的，大多数情况下是未成熟的中枢神经系统的反射。

sentences.sContent: Examples of this would be a half-hour sitcom, a one-hour drama, an episodic documentary, a how-to program such as cooking or home repair or a reality show.
sentences.sContent_eng: Examples of this would be a half-hour sitcom, a one-hour drama, an episodic documentary, a how-to program such as cooking or home repair or a reality show.
sentences.sCn: 包括半小时的情景喜剧，一小时的剧情片，一部插话式的纪录片，一个诸如烹饪或家居修补或真人秀的指引类节目。

phrases.pCn: 情景记忆，情节记忆；事件记忆

words.tran: 插曲；一段情节；插话；有趣的事件
